summary: What kind of neckwear does any self-respecting Nord want? Torcs...
descriptionHtml:
What kind of neckwear does any self-respecting Nord want? Torcs...
Torcs symbolize honor and valor among Nords.

This mod adds 5 different style of neck torc: gemmed claw (with 3 variants), raven, ring, Nordic bear and savage dragon.

-Torcs can use either the mod neck slot (45, does not compete with amulets/necklaces so you can wear both at the same time.) or the amulet/necklace slot (35). Just download the main file version for the slot type you want (download one or the other, not both!)

-Male and female versions, all scaling with weight slider.

-Currently there are 7 material versions of each style: dwarven, ebony, elven, glass, gold, silver and steel. All versions are available to craft as Mage Torcs (non-armored jewelry). Mage Torcs are found under the jewelry section when crafting and are enchantable.

-All versions except gold and silver are currently available as armored versions (very small armor bonus). The armored versions are found under their respective material categories when crafting and require the appropriate smithing perks. Armored torcs are temperable and enchantable.

-Because torcs are worn closely around the neck, armors which cover this area will also cover the torcs...strange clippings may occur. These are really intended for use on characters with exposed neck areas (IE: works best with "skimpy" outfits.).

-Distributed among NPC's via leveled lists at an 8% appearance rate.


[youtube]QH3IwFBvhGQ[/youtube]

[youtube]PWuwuDMGCaQ[/youtube]

Requirements: Skyrim w/ Update

Revision notes:
1.7: Fixed borked race tags, should now appear properly on custom races as well as draugr

1.6: Reduced leveled list chance from 25% to 8%

1.5: Fixed issue with torcs not showing up on Argonians. Branched into separate main files so torcs will use either slot 45 or 35 depending on user preference. Added leveled list distribution. Added compatibility for Complete Crafting Overhaul Remade.

1.4: Added new gemmed claw style torcs.

1.3: Moved all torcs to slot 45 (mod neck) rather than 35 (amulet). After doing the male versions, I wanted to revisit the female versions. I scaled them down a bit to better fit the female neck and made proper _0 and _1 versions, so they scale properly with the weight slider now.

1.2: Added male versions of all torcs, added all materials as non-armored jewelry variants (Mage Torcs)

1.1: corrected to make all versions enchantable, reexported textures as DXT1 for optimization; reduced texture footprint by 110Mb (Thank you Naitrii for noting this needed to be done!)

1.0: initial release
author: cleanzor
